00029 #define XML_INDENTATION_STRING "  "
00030 #define XML_INTEGER_VALUE_PRINTF_FORMAT "%d"
00031 #define XML_FLOATING_VALUE_PRINTF_FORMAT "%.2f"

00033 namespace RDK2 { namespace Serialization { namespace Xml {
00034 
00035 template<typename T>
00036 std::string vtos(T v, const char* format)
00037 {
00038     char buffer[512];
00039     sprintf(buffer, format, v);
00040     return string(buffer);
00041 }
00042 
00044 class XmlWriter: public Writer {
00045 
00049 public:
00050     XmlWriter(bool indent) : indent(indent) { };
00051     virtual ~XmlWriter() { };
00052     
00054     std::string serialize(bool withClassName, const Writable* w);
00055 
00059 public:
00060     void startWriting(cstr myClassName, unsigned char version = 1) throw (WritingException);
00061         
00062         void write_u8(uint8_t, cstr name) throw (WritingException);
00063         void write_i8(int8_t, cstr name) throw (WritingException);
00064         void write_i16(int16_t, cstr name) throw (WritingException);
00065         void write_i32(int32_t, cstr name) throw (WritingException);
00066         void write_f32(float32_t, cstr name) throw (WritingException);
00067         void write_f64(float64_t, cstr name) throw (WritingException);
00068         
00069         void write_u8(const uint8_t*, size_t n, cstr name) throw (WritingException);
00070         void write_i8(const int8_t*, size_t n, cstr name) throw (WritingException);
00071         void write_i16(const int16_t*, size_t n, cstr name) throw (WritingException);
00072         void write_i32(const int32_t*, size_t n, cstr name) throw (WritingException);
00073         void write_f32(const float32_t*, size_t n, cstr name) throw (WritingException);
00074         void write_f64(const float64_t*, size_t n, cstr name) throw (WritingException);
00075 
00076         void writeBytes(const void* i, size_t n, cstr name) throw (WritingException);
00077         void writeString(cstr s, cstr name) throw (WritingException);
00078         
00079         void writeObject(bool needClassName, const Writable* w, cstr name = "") throw (WritingException);
00080     
00081     void doneWriting() throw(WritingException);
00082 
00083 private:
00084     bool indent, writeNs;
00085     xmlTextWriter* writer;
00086     xmlBuffer* buffer;
00087     std::string curObjectName;
00088 
00090     inline void startElement(const char* type) {
00091         xmlTextWriterStartElementNS(writer, XML_NAMESPACE_PREFIX, BAD_CAST type, XML_NAMESPACE_URI);
00092     }
00093     
00094     inline void writeAttribute(const char* attributeName, const char* attributeValue) {
00095         xmlTextWriterWriteAttribute(writer, BAD_CAST attributeName, BAD_CAST attributeValue);
00096     }
00097     
00098     inline void startNamedElement(const char* type, cstr name) {
00099         startElement(type);
00100         if (name != "") writeAttribute("name", name.c_str());
00101     }
00102     
00103     inline void endElement() {
00104         xmlTextWriterEndElement(writer);
00105     }
00106 
00108     void throwIt(cstr error) throw (WritingException);
00109 };
